post:
# Features

- SolusVM Powered
- Owned IP addresses and ASN (AS57695)
- Native IPv6
- BGP Session Available
- 3 day Money Back Guarantee
- Full root access
- Customized Infrastructure (Cached Mirror, DNS)

# About Korea Datacenter

Currently we only have Hurricane Electric transit now, which means that inbound traffic from some major ISPs in Korea will be routed via United States. And yes, we don't have China direct bandwidth now.

Our [LG](https://bgp.he.net/AS3786) transit via [AS135605](https://bgp.he.net/AS135605) will be available soon™.

Looking Glass: http://kr-icn05.lg.zeptovm.com/

Test IP: 185.2.49.233 / 2a0b:4342:5000:233::

[Purchase](https://www.zeptovm.com/clientarea/cart.php?a=add&pid=44)

### How about BGP Session?

BGP Session is also available in this region, but we can only announce to KINX peers (incl AWS, Google and HE) now.

# Offers

Payment Method: Credit Card (via Stripe), Alipay

Promo Code `WTFSINGLEHOMEDHEKRVPS`

## Nano (Seoul, KR)

- CPU **1 vCPU**
- RAM **512 MiB **
- Storage **8 GiB SAS**
- Bandwidth **512 GiB (In + Out)**
- Uplink **4 x 1Gbps**
- IPv4 1 * /32
- IPv6 1 * /64
- Unmanaged
- **No** DDoS Protection (We **don't** provide DDos Protection)

Pricing: $5 / mo, $3 FIRST MONTH

[Purchase](https://www.zeptovm.com/clientarea/cart.php?a=add&pid=45)
